1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

Please include a minimal reproducible example (AKA a reprex). If you've never heard of a [reprex](http://reprex.tidyverse.org/) before, start by reading <https://www.tidyverse.org/help/#reprex>.
